process.name: TCP4-2273 Verify Intermediate Timer Event
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_7</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_2" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="250" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_7</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_15</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_9</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="node_3" name="Exclusive Gateway">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_9</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_13</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:task id="node_4" name="Form Task 2" pm:screenRef="251" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_18</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent id="node_5" name="Intermediate Timer Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_13</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_15</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
        <bpmn:timeDuration>PT1M</bpmn:timeDuration>
      </bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
    </bpmn:intermediateCatchEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_7" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_2"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_9" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_3"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_11" name="var1==2" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_4">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">var1==2</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_13" name="var1==1" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_5">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">var1==1</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_15" sourceRef="node_5" targetRef="node_2"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_16" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_18</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_18" sourceRef="node_4" targetRef="node_16"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="90" y="280" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <dc:Bounds x="220" y="240" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="390" y="270" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <dc:Bounds x="370" y="410" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <dc:Bounds x="530" y="160" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_7_di" bpmnElement="node_7">
        <di:waypoint x="108" y="298"/>
        <di:waypoint x="278" y="278"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_9_di" bpmnElement="node_9">
        <di:waypoint x="278" y="278"/>
        <di:waypoint x="408" y="288"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <di:waypoint x="408" y="288"/>
        <di:waypoint x="428" y="448"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_13_di" bpmnElement="node_13">
        <di:waypoint x="408" y="288"/>
        <di:waypoint x="548" y="178"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_15_di" bpmnElement="node_15">
        <di:waypoint x="548" y="178"/>
        <di:waypoint x="278" y="278"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_16_di" bpmnElement="node_16">
        <dc:Bounds x="560" y="440" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_18_di" bpmnElement="node_18">
        <di:waypoint x="428" y="448"/>
        <di:waypoint x="578" y="458"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>

config.name: Variable Name
config.label: Variable Name
config.helper: A variable name is a symbolic name to reference information.

config.label: Label
config.helper: The label describes the field's name

config.name: Data Type

config.helper: The data type specifies what kind of data is stored in the variable.

config.label: Data Format
config.helper: The data format for the selected type.

config.helper: The validation rules needed for this field

config.label: Placeholder Text
config.helper: The placeholder is what is shown in the field when no value is provided yet

config.label: Helper Text
config.helper: Help text is meant to provide additional guidance on the field's value

config.label: Text Color
config.helper: Set the element's text color

config.label: Background Color
config.helper: Set the element's background color

config.label: Default Value
config.helper: The default value is pre populated using the existing request data. This feature will allow you to modify the value displayed on screen load if needed.

config.label: Visibility Rule
config.helper: This control is hidden until this expression is true

config.helper:
